com.tangosol.util

Class VersionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tangosol.util.VersionHelper

  • public class VersionHelper
extends Object
    A utility class for working with Coherence versions.

      • encodeVersion

        public static int encodeVersion(int nYear,
                                int nMonth,
                                int nPatch)
        Convert the version elements into a single integer value.
        Parameters:
        nYear - the version year
        nMonth - the version month
        nPatch - the version patch
        Returns:
        the yy-mm-patch version encoded as an int

      • encodeVersion

        public static int encodeVersion(int nMajor,
                                int nMinor,
                                int nMicro,
                                int nPatchSet,
                                int nPatch)
        Convert the version elements into a single integer value.
        Parameters:
        nMajor - the major version number
        nMinor - the minor version number
        nMicro - the micro version number
        nPatchSet - the patch set version number
        nPatch - the patch version number
        Returns:
        the version encoded as an int

      • getVersionPrefix

        public static int getVersionPrefix(int nYear,
                                   int nMonth)
        Return the version prefix for a given yy-mm version.
        Parameters:
        nYear - the version year
        nMonth - the version month
        Returns:
        the version prefix

      • isCalendarVersion

        public static boolean isCalendarVersion(int nVersion)
        Return true if the provided part of the version could represent a year.
        Parameters:
        nVersion - the version part to check
        Returns:
        true if the provided part of the version could represent a year

      • parseVersion

        public static int parseVersion(String sVersion)
        Parse the specified version string and generate an internal integer representation.
        Parameters:
        sVersion - the version string to encode
        Returns:
        the version string encoded to an int

      • toVersionArray

        public static int[] toVersionArray(String sVersion)
        Create an array of version elements, where index 0 is "major", 1 is "minor", ... 4 is "patch".

      • toVersionString

        public static String toVersionString(int nVersion,
                                     boolean fIncludePrefix)
        Create a string representation of the specified version in internal encoding.

      • isVersionCompatible

        public static boolean isVersionCompatible(int nRequired,
                                          int nActual)
        Return true iff the actual version provided is greater than or equal to the required version.
        Parameters:
        nRequired - the required version in its encoded form
        nActual - the actual version in its encoded form
        Returns:
        true iff the actual version provided is greater than or equal to the required version

      • isPatchCompatible

        public static boolean isPatchCompatible(int nRequired,
                                        int nActual)
        Return true iff the required and the actual versions provided have the identical base version, and the actual patch version is greater or equal to the required patch version.
        Parameters:
        nRequired - the required version in its encoded form
        nActual - the actual version in its encoded form
        Returns:
        true iff the required and the actual versions provided have the identical base version, and the actual patch version is greater or equal to the required patch version

      • resolveFusionAppsPatchSet

        public static void resolveFusionAppsPatchSet(int[] anVersion)
        This method will map Fusion Apps versions to the correct Coherence version.
        Parameters:
        anVersion - the possible FA version to resolve to a Coherence version

      • resolveFusionAppsPatchSet

        public static int resolveFusionAppsPatchSet(int nMajor,
                                            int nMinor,
                                            int nMicro,
                                            int nPatchSet)
        Return the actual patch set value to use for a given version.

        This method will map Fusion Apps versions to the correct Coherence version.

        Parameters:
        nMajor - the major version number
        nMinor - the minor version number
        nMicro - the micro version number
        nPatchSet - the patch set version number
        Returns:
        the actual patch set value to use

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Compare two version strings for compatability.

        The first string is the version to test, the second is the version required. If the second version is compatible with the first, then "pass" is displayed otherwise "fail" is displayed.

        Parameters:
        args - the two version strings to compare
